about_the_game:
Cleromancy is a turn based combat roguelite in which fate is decided by dice rolls akin to traditionnal TTRPGs. Build your pouch by collecting dice sporting various materials, inks and special effects and lead your heroes to victory !



By a malicious twist of fate, a maintenance class androïd SID-518 and Roxane the crysthaumaturge fell from the mighty flying city of Neossia. Now stranded on hostile grounds, they have no choice but to rely on an adept of cleromancy, Nitya, to help them go back home. Beware however, for their journey shall be long and perilous. Fight your way through mindless machines and tormented souls, explore the deserted lands of Tanahkuno, and uncover disturbing truths. Every success is but a roll away.


  • A roguelite inspired gameplay loop : one life per attempt, each success or setback giving you permanent rewards for your next tries.
  • Turn based combat combining luck and strategy.
  • An inverted power dynamic between the player and the characters : give them situations, they make choices. Heroes of whom you are the book !
  • Visually meaningful environments : observe, learn, and plan your paths to maximise your chances of success.
  • An illustrated world : 100% hand drawn and animated.
  • Shiny math rocks : collect a plethora of dice and put them to good use through increasingly powerful options for your characters.
